name: Icarus
description: Strategies and plans. My fate lies in my hands.

set.2: Equipping Precious One, **2** or more weapons of different elements, or **2** or more types of weapons increases all elemental damage by **8%**/9%/10%/11%. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.4: When dealing frost damage, increase all elemental damage by **13%**/16%/19%/22% for **4** seconds. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
